detectors.description:
StakingRewardsWithPlatformToken.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakingRewardsWithPlatformToken.sol#1244-1275) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = _reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakingRewardsWithPlatformToken.sol#1257)
	-leftoverReward = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/StakingRewardsWithPlatformToken.sol#1264)
